name: Resonator
description: This algorithm is an implementation of the open-source Rings module by Émilie Gillet. It can be played via MIDI or I2C, or simply via CV/gate as the original. The disting NT relies on 'input' parameters being enabled/disabled to simulate input normalization (e.g., if the 'Strum input' parameter is set to ‘None’, the algorithm generates its own strums internally). Any demos or tutorials for the original module apply equally here.
gui_description: Interface mimics the original Rings module with knobs for parameters like Brightness, Damping, Position, and Structure. Input/output routing is handled via parameter selections (e.g., 'Strum input', 'V/Oct input'). MIDI/I2C modes are configurable via dropdowns.

input_ports.name: Strum input (CV)
input_ports.description: Input for strum CV/gate. Behavior depends on 'Strum input' parameter setting.

input_ports.name: V/Oct input
input_ports.description: Pitch CV input (V/octave). Bus selected via 'V/Oct input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Audio input
input_ports.description: External audio signal for resonator processing. Bus selected via 'Audio input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Brightness input
input_ports.description: CV control for brightness modulation. Bus selected via 'Brightness input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Frequency input
input_ports.description: CV control for frequency modulation. Bus selected via 'Frequency input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Damping input
input_ports.description: CV control for damping modulation. Bus selected via 'Damping input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Structure input
input_ports.description: CV control for resonator structure modulation. Bus selected via 'Structure input' parameter.

input_ports.name: Position input
input_ports.description: CV control for position modulation. Bus selected via 'Position input' parameter.

output_ports.name: Odd output
output_ports.description: Resonator output (odd harmonics). Routing and mode controlled by parameters.

output_ports.name: Even output
output_ports.description: Resonator output (even harmonics). Routing and mode controlled by parameters.
